sentence: The group previously filed similar actions against Rep. Madison Cawthorn (R-N.C.) and Rep. Paul Gosar (R-Ariz.) on the same grounds, citing the 14th Amendment’s disqualification clause.
author: Adam Klasfeld
title: Federal Judge Refuses to Block Effort to Disqualify Marjorie Taylor Greene from Office Under 14th Amendment ‘Insurrection’ Prohibition

author: Ross Williams
title: Lawsuit seeking to boot Marjorie Taylor Greene from the ballot is probably 'going nowhere': legal expert

sentence: “I don’t remember.” She was asked if she talked to Rep. Andy Biggs (R-Ariz.) “I don’t remember.” She was asked if she talked to Rep. Paul Gosar (R-Ariz.) “Sorry, I don’t remember.” What about anyone in the White House?
author: Ryan Bort
title: ‘I Don’t Remember’: Marjorie Taylor Greene Comes Down With Case of Jan. 6 Amnesia While Under Oath

sentence: There are similar efforts to block members like Arizona GOP Reps. Paul Gosar and Andy Biggs from appearing on state ballots.
author: Tyler Durden
title: Destroying Democracy To Save It? Court Advances Effort To Block GOP Candidates From Ballots

sentence: A judge in Arizona has thrown out lawsuits that sought to disqualify Reps. Paul Gosar (R-Ariz.) and Andy Biggs (R-Ariz.) from serving in their current capacities in Congress.
author: WD Staff
title: AZ Judge Kicks Out Disqualification Complaints For Two GOP Representatives
